title: How to Make a Cheezy Beer Dip

steps.headline: Pour the cheese dip in a microwaveable bowl.
Place the bowl in the microwave and heat the cheese according to the directions.
steps.description: Be sure to stop the time and stir every so often.

steps.headline: Carefully pour the beer into the melted cheese.
Sprinkle some diced green onion on the top as a garnish.

text: Pour the cheese dip in a microwaveable bowl.  Place the bowl in the microwave and heat the cheese according to the directions. Be sure to stop the time and stir every so often. Carefully pour the beer into the melted cheese.  Stir the ingredients thoroughly.  Sprinkle some diced green onion on the top as a garnish.
